original_title: IU: dlwlrma. 10th Anniversary Tour Concert in Seoul
overview: 收录曲目 01. VCR #1 (Opening) + The Red Shoes 02. VCR #2 (Cinema) + Between the lips (50cm) 03. Lost Child + VCR 04. VCR #3 (Fake Documentary) + Twenty-Three 05. BBIBBI 06. VCR #4 (Animation) + Marshmallow 07. You & I 08. VCR #5 (Encore) + Through the Night
title: IU: dlwlrma. 10th Anniversary Tour Concert in Seoul
